name: SalesAgentUSA.com
tag_list: sales, sales-agent, sales-rep, sales-representative, distributor, manufacturers-agent
overview:
SalesAgentUSA.com is the premier online destination where companies come in contact with independent sales agents, sales representatives, and distributors. It is a part of EMBEEM, which is a group of companies that is headquartered in the USA and owns and operates several leading web portals around the world.

Our mission is to help companies grow and expand by helping them find qualified and interested sales agents. Since our formation in 2005, we are proud to have helped thousands of companies worldwide perform well in their existing territories and expand into new territories around the globe. Our sister sites are:

• SalesAgentEurope.com • SalesAgentIndia.com • SalesAgentChina.com • SalesAgentAfrica.com • SalesAgentSouthAmerica.com • SalesAgentAustralia.com

We have thousands of sales agents around the world and we continue to grow our network by the hundreds every month across various categories and industries. The sales agents who join our network are actively searching for new product lines and opportunities to get involved with. Many of the sales agents are established and well-connected in their industry, but are still looking for new product lines and opportunities. The sales agents are generally looking for either commission-only, buy/resell, or fixed-salary arrangements.

Our companies are EMBEEM Incorporated (New Jersey, USA), EMBEEM Limited (London, UK), and EMBEEM Enterprises Private Limited (Mumbai, India).
